---
title: "FOUNDING DOCUMENTS OF THE GLENLAKE UPSTATE HOMEOWNERS ASSOCIATION, INC."
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(lubridate)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)


```

> Disclaimer: this document is a list of the founding legal documents of the Glenlake Upstate Homeowners Association, registered at the Spartanburg Register of Deeds and serves only to provide a overview of the founding documents. This document cannot be used to claim legal standing. The editors believe this is the most recent version as of `r format(lubridate::today(), format="%B %d, %Y")`


```{r dataread, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
foundingdocs <- read_csv("founding_documents_index.csv") %>% arrange(date) %>% mutate(Date = format(date, format="%B %d, %Y")) %>% select(Date, Purpose, "Deed Book", Page)
```

```{r dataprint, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(foundingdocs, "pipe")
```
